overview: Cameras roll as the USS & Ronald Reagan &  journeys from the shipyard to its San Diego home port in this behind-the-scenes look at Nimitz-class aircraft carriers and their crews. The program reveals the technologies behind the massive craft and provides a guided tour of the vessel's bridge, deck and even sleeping quarters. Interviews with crew members provide insight into daily life on board a cutting-edge warship.
title: Carrier: Arsenal of the Sea
